metadata.title: CVE-2018-19871 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.11.3. There is QTgaFile UncontrolledResource Consumption.

criterions.comment: qtimageformats-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qt4-x11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
